item.title: Shops Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

I believe for changing their HP, it’d be in npc.cfg also, I’m running deltascape source, and I know I can change the HP in npc.cfg.

Such as in npc.cfg, mine says:

npc = 683	Bow_and_Arrow_salesman		0	0

Since the 683 NPC doesn’t have 3 0’s, he has no HP, but since this npc:

npc = 795	Ice_Queen			111	505	50

Has 3, (the 505 = HP), Ice_Queen has 505 HP.

Which means my Bow_and_Arrow_salesman has no HP, but works fine… I’m not sure if changing the HP will help, but it’s worth a shot. o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @99skiller99 99skiller99
item.description:
@99skiller99 wrote:

I’ve only spawned 3 Npc’s that already had a shop configured to them. All 3 don’t open up their shops accordingly.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2008, 12:42:45 pm[/size][hr][quote=“MoparScaperDude, post:8, topic:235293”]I believe someone told me that if it’s a Devolution base, make sure the NPC has more than 0 HP.

Not sure if it works though. It’s worth a shot?[/quote]

It’s Deltascape based. Vegeta’s Cleaned v1.1 so I know it isn’t Devolution and I don’t know how to change their Hp anyway.

item.title: Shops Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @99skiller99 99skiller99
item.description:
@99skiller99 wrote:

[size=15pt]//If You’re Going To View This Thread Please Post Something Useful. :D[/size]

Now I need help getting my shops to work. They are in shops.cfg, Case 17: second click npc and everything, but when I click the NPC they won’t open up.

			if(NPCID == 683) {
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 33; 
			}

and in shops.cfg

shop = 33	Bow_and_Arrows			2	2	886	1500	888	1000	843	4	845	4	849	3	847	3	853	2	851	2	39	5000	40	5000	41	5000	42	5000	43	5000	44	5000

But the NPC 683 won’t open up to show me what he’s selling.

Read full topic
